entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:32 AM NDT Friday 28 April 2023
